papers.title: Machine-learning predictions for the nuclear charge radius: Bayesian method versus decision-tree-based algorithm
papers.authors: Zhilong Li, Yongjia Wang, Qingfeng Li, and Bing-feng Lv
papers.summary: Author(s): Zhilong Li, Yongjia Wang, Qingfeng Li, and Bing-feng LvIn this work, two popular modern machine learning (ML) algorithms, the light gradient boosting machine (LightGBM, a decision tree-based algorithm) and the sparse variational Gaussian process (SVGP, a Bayesian method), are used to assess their performance in predicting the nuclear charge radius ${R}_…[Phys. Rev. C 112, 014312] Published Fri Jul 11, 2025
